This game is amazing. I first played it on my fathers tablet, but after enjoying it so much I got it on my phone years later. I have played they this game several different times and collected all the chests. It is easily my favorite mobile game. I can spend a long time sitting down and playing this game. I only wish that there was more. Like a Swordigo 2 or something. 

Also, on a side note, I realized it‚Äôs compatible with my PS4 controller. I just connect it using Bluetooth and voila, I can play my favorite mobile game with my controller. 

One minor glitch I ran into was that one my most recent save, it won‚Äôt track the progress of me getting the last chest. It is supposed to say I‚Äôve completed 100% of it, but it won‚Äôt go up from 99%. I‚Äôve only experienced this glitch once though, and it doesn‚Äôt really bother me. In my previous saves, I haven‚Äôt ran into any other kind of issues. 

Overall it‚Äôs a 10/10 game. Definitely wholesome, and easily the best mobile game I‚Äôve ever played. Thanks Touch Foo.

Edit: Also to all those people who say this game is too hard. I need to let you know it‚Äôs really not. It simply comes down to fighting and dodging. And if you‚Äôre current health doesn‚Äôt seem to cut it, its easy to go back and get the chests or fight off enemies for XP so you can level up. All those petty haters need to chill.
No it‚Äôs to hard

They did a great job with this. A well balanced RPG with some great performing elements. Plenty of great secret areas to explore and it‚Äôs well designed. There are great mini bosses and major bosses to fight and very useful magic spells to use. This is a mandatory classic to keep on your phone.
